entry.title: Curiosity Killed the Cat
entry.summary:
Author: robinspanties (Aslannbg)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,070Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 405

Summary: When Tim Drake was eight years old, he became convinced that the abandoned manor next to his home belonged to a secret family of vampires. Four years later, his theories were proven true to him. Six years after that, he finally starts to get closer to what's really going on in Gotham.Human Tim Drake stalks a family full of vampires. They're weirdly chill about it.
